Title: Cooking With Style
Description:
Sorry my daughter roped you into this. I'm sure you had better things to be doing. 

She has terrible manners. I'll have to have words with whoever raised her.

<The general's mouth twitches in a quick smirk.>

Still, you are here. Would you like to join us for the more enjoyable activity? We're about to start cooking.
ObjectivesText: Допоможіть Сталебоям приготувати страву в Мерелдарі.
CompletionText: Чому тут сказано "дрібка солі"? Чому не жменя? Більше інгредієнтів напевно краще.
RewardText:
Hah! Oh flames, I had forgotten how much fun cooking can be!

I really needed that.

Objectives.Text: Поговоріть із генералом Сталебій, щоб почати готувати
Join the Steelstrikes in the Cookhouse
